benchmark_details.name: SafeToolBench
benchmark_details.overview: SafeToolBench is the first benchmark to comprehensively assess tool utilization security in a prospective manner, encompassing malicious user instructions and diverse practical toolsets across 16 real-world domains.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess the safety of tool utilization in LLMs before executing potentially harmful actions.

data.source: Generated using GPT-4o based on real-world scenarios.
data.annotation: Manually reviewed and rated by experts.

methodology.calculation: Scores are computed based on user instructions, tool characteristics, and their interactions, with predefined thresholds.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate higher risks associated with tool utilization.
methodology.validation: Data validated through expert review and scoring protocols.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All data generated ensures no real personal or sensitive information is used.
